main_definition: A seminar is an educational event or meeting, typically focused on a specific topic of study or professional development, where experts present their findings and participants engage in discussions to enhance knowledge.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An academic course or lecture series
meanings_and_examples.example: The university offered an advanced seminar on quantum physics for postgraduate students.
To improve our customer service skills, the team attended a weekly marketing seminar organized by HR.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An event for discussion and exchange of ideas among experts in a particular field
meanings_and_examples.example: The international conference on climate change featured several expert-led seminars discussing new research findings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A smaller, more focused version of a course or lecture series
meanings_and_examples.example: Students could choose to attend individual seminars as part of their elective courses in the humanities department.
